DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determined effects of BreatheMAX on secretion clearance.
DOC.brief_title: The Effectiveness of BreatheMAX Breathing Device on Secretion Clearance
DOC.criteria: One sign of secretion accumulation in bronchi Stable cardiopulmonary function Good consciousness and good cooperation Massive hemoptysis Pneumothorax (untreated)
